CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The combination of benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b 0 ]dithiophene planarity and efficient π-π stacking with the electron - withdrawing capacity of the imide functionality serves as the foundation for this new class of materials.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b' ]dithiophene |
| imide functionality |

I have removed any ambiguity and only provided the two material names mentioned in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The combination of benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b 0 ]dithiophene planarity and efficient π-π stacking with the electron - withdrawing capacity of the imide functionality serves as the foundation for this new class of materials.

Let's think step by step.

Property Name
-----------------
benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b^(0) ]dithiophene planarity
efficient π-π stacking
electron - withdrawing capacity of the imide functionality

Note: I've assumed that the "^(0)" in "benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b^(0) ]dithiophene" is a superscript zero, and I've preserved it as it appears in the original paragraph. If it's not the case, please let me know, and I'll make the necessary adjustments.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

-----------------
benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b^(0) ]dithiophene planarity
efficient π-π stacking
electron - withdrawing capacity of the imide functionality

Note: I've reviewed the paragraph again, and I believe all the mentioned entities can be considered material properties. If you have any specific concerns or doubts, please let me know, and I'll be happy to address them.
